title: WTB: N172 Old Judge - Great 19th Century Players (non HOF)
author: ternst17

posts.post_title: WTB: N172 Old Judge - Great 19th Century Players (non HOF)
posts.post_content: I’m looking to add another OJ to my collection. I’m priced out on HOFers, but would be interested in great 19th century players who have been left out of the HOF. I’m thinking guys like Jim McCormick, Tony Mullane, Jack Glasscock, Bob Caruthers, etc…Budget is up to $600.
